physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order, from the front to the rear.At the rear of the file are internal office notes (f 9).

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Correspondence and other papers concerning a plan by Michael Hanna Shaikh of the Hanna Shaikh River Transport Company to form an Iraqi Shipping Company. The correspondence discusses any objections that the British Government might have and includes a letter from an employee of Mackinnon, Mackenzie & Co. regarding the struggles of the British India Steam Navigation Company. The file also includes an extract from an article in the Iraq Timesregarding the plans to form the company.
